channel.title: BUscience

item.title: New evidence pushes back arrival of early hominins in Europe

item.title: Myth busted: Healthy habits take longer than 21 days to set in

item.title: Strong as steel, light as foam: High-performance, nano-architected materials
item.description: Researchers have used machine learning to design nano-architected materials that have the strength of carbon steel but the lightness of Styrofoam. The...

item.title: Finding better photovoltaic materials faster with AI
